dcterms:creator: Holger Caesar
Varun Bankiti
Alex H Lang
dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset consists of 1000 driving scenes, each lasting 20 seconds, with approximately 1.4 million images, calibrated camera parameters, and associated LIDAR data, including 3D annotations of bounding boxes for 23 object classes and 9 background classes.
dcterms:title: nuScenes dataset
